author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Ghacks Deals: Summer Blowout Sale
text:
Ghacks Deals: Summer Blowout Sale By Martin Brinkmann on September 4, 2015 in ghacks - Last Update: September 4, 2015 0 
Gear and Gadgets is a popular category on Ghacks Deals. Today, we provide you with even better deals for the most popular gadgets in the category. 
Tip : use the coupon code eos5off for an extra 5% off on those deals. 
Lets take a closer look: 2-in-1 iOS & Android Extra-Long Charging Cable for $17.99 (55% off) - This handy 6-foot MFi-certified charging cable will keep your trusted devices powered from a distance, so you won’t be stuck slouching over a pesky outlet. 3-in-1 Smartphone Photography Lens Set for $19.99 (69% off) - You can’t put a price on great photos…but this is one unbeatable price. With the 3-in-1 Smartphone Photography Lens Set, you’ll take photos so spectacular that you’ll have friends asking to borrow your DSLR. Easily switch between lenses with the magnetic “snap-on, snap-off” functionality, and take advantage of a wide angle, macro, and fisheye lens. The Invisible iPhone 6 Case & Screen Protector for $24.99 (69% off) - This ultra-slim, hard-shell, crystal-clear case is just what you need to keep your iPhone 6 safe, and sporting its design as Apple intended. MMOVE Stereo Bluetooth Earbuds for $29.99 (49% off) - The MMOVE Earbuds deliver the latest in premium audio technology and superior comfort, at a price point that wows. Braided 10-Foot MFi-Certified Lightning Cable for $19.99 (33% off) - Just say no to cheap, non-MFi Lightning cables, and yes to supercharging your Apple devices with this premium braided cable. DJI Phantom 2 for $599 (37% off) - Grab your camera and get flying! DJI’s new and improved drone boasts double the flight time and superior hardware. With more efficiently designed propellers and a new flight controller, there is clearly a reason why DJI is the clear choice for a top-notch quadcopter (US only). Snowflake Stealth Drone for $29.99 (70% off) - The Snowflake’s smooth maneuvers, flawless 4-way flips, and 360˚rolls in any direction make it truly best in class. Soar, hover, flip, and tilt with ease or join a fleet of drones, thanks to advanced anti-collision technology. This fun quadcopter, with its durable design and gyro-stabilization, is fit for any terrain and any pilot ready to hit the skies (US only). Limited-Edition 'Code Black' HD-Camera Drone for $69 (65% off) - The Code Black is our top-selling drone of all time—and for good reason. This powerful, palm-size drone is not only insanely fun to fly, but can capture some serious video footage from up above. With a flight time of about 10 minutes and an ultra-smooth ride, it’s a great introductory drone for anyone looking to dominate the sky. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
